title: B
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''b''' will [[movement|move]] you one square down and left.
*Pressing '''shift+b''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting 

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''b''' represents a [[bat]] or [[list of birds|bird]]-type monster.
*'''B''' represents a [[List_of_insects#Beetles|beetle]]-type monster.
